Package com.armemius.lab5.collection

Class CollectionManager

java.lang.Object
com.armemius.lab5.collection.CollectionManager
public class CollectionManager extends Object
CollectionManager is singleton class that handles operations with collection and its data On initialization, it sets up serializer and gets environment variable 'LAB_5_PATH' that points to file with data
